item.title: How to Make Your Docker Images Go on a Diet 🏊‍♂️
item.description: Hey there, Docker enthusiast! 🌟 Are your Docker images feeling a little bloated lately? Don’t worry, you’re not alone. As our applications grow, so do our Docker images, but with a few nifty tricks, you can slim them down and keep everything running smooth as butter. 🧈 In this guide, we’ll explore how to optimize your Docker images using Alpine, Distroless, Scratch images, and multi-stage builds. Let’s dive in! 🏊‍♂️
